Function reference

version 0.2.1

Authorization

EIDITH logon credentials

  • ed_auth

Database

Download EIDITH data to local storage

  • ed_db_download

Export the local EIDITH database to a file

  • ed_db_export

Get the status of the locally stored EIDITH database

  • ed_db_status

Check the online EIDITH database for updates since your last download.

  • ed_db_updates

EIDITH data

EIDITH table metadata

  • ed_metadata
  • ed_taxagroups

Load EIDITH data from the local database

  • ed_table_
  • ed_table
  • ed_events
  • ed_animals
  • ed_specimens
  • ed_tests
  • ed_viruses
  • ed_testspecimen

Reports and Analyses

Export FASTA files

  • ed_fasta
  • fasta
  • ed_fasta_
  • ed_tests_report

Raw data

Functions to download EIDITH tables via API

  • ed_get
  • ed_get_events
  • ed_get_animals
  • ed_get_specimens
  • ed_get_tests
  • ed_get_viruses
  • ed_get_testspecimen

Standard post-processing of EIDITH exports

  • ed_process
